actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: Joint resolution to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to designate the site of the Battle of Savannah of 1779 as the Savannah Battlefield National Memorial.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to designate the site of the Battle of Savannah of 1779 as the "Savannah Battlefield National Memorial". Allows the Secretary to withdraw such designation at any time. Authorizes the Secretary to provide advisory services to organizations engaged in the development of the battlefield area.

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to designate the site of the Battle of Savannah of 1779 as the Savannah Battlefield National Memorial.
